titleStmt.title: The scornful ladie A comedie. As it was acted (with great applause) by the Children of Her Maiesties Reuels in the Blacke Fryers. Written byFra. Beaumont and Io. Fletcher, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Beale] for Myles Partritch, are to be sold at his shop at the George neere St. Dunstons Church in Fleet-streete,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC (Greg has Richard Bradock).
Most running titles read: The scornefull ladie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
